name: Shashwat Kumar
review: Ordered Brass wall light from Handicraft. Happy and satisfied with the quality of the product. The carvings made are really impressive and the conical lattice shape gives it a majestic look.

name: Anto Pereira
review: I wandered in the store and found many items I liked & also developed a great conversation with the team, friendly place where collapsing & positive energy radiates throughout the store. Thank you for the excellent customer service!!

name: Ramesh Rao
review: Handicraft has some great collection & really awesome customer service. One of the finest stores in the country I have been to.

name: Siddhi Agarwal
review: I bought this beautiful Nari planter and hand-beaten tea set. The package arrived neatly wrapped and well in time. The products look fab and am mightily impressed by the seamlessness of the ordering process.

name: Shashank Singh
review: I was looking for something rustic to go along with my living room interiors when I came across this website. Some of the products have a lovely handicraft vibe to them. So I ordered a clock and some pottery and was really impressed with the packaging. That’s not the best part, I later discovered that the products came directly from a village made by craftsmen of the third generation. It’s a lovely way to support artisans and their families.

name: Nitesh Shrothi
review: Ordered a wind chime. Liked the quality of material and designing. Received a lovely letter from Handicraft as well. Looking forward to getting some more. Cheers.
